articles.description: Manchester City have dropped points in the race for the Champions League - so who needs what?
articles.title: Who will qualify for the Champions League, Europa and Conference League permutations

articles.description: Harry Kane scores as newly-crowned Bundesliga champions Bayern Munich beat Borussia Monchengladbach in Thomas Muller's last home game for the club.
articles.title: Bayern Munich 2-0 Borussia Monchengladbach: Harry Kane scores as Bundesliga champions win

articles.description: Southampton avoid becoming an addition to a pub quiz question after moving past Derby County's record low total of 11 points.
articles.title: Southampton: Bottom club reach 12 points after draw with Manchester City

articles.description: Jannik Sinner beats Mariano Navone at the Italian Open in the first match since his doping ban.
articles.title: Jannik Sinner: Italian Open comeback win gives world number one 'amazing feeling'

articles.description:
"I said from the start when I joined the club that that's what I had my eyes on."
 - It's official, Ollie Watkins is Aston Villa's record Premier League goalscorer.
articles.title: Ollie Watkins: 'Fantastic' Aston Villa striker 'shows weight in gold'

articles.description: Carlo Ancelotti calls Xabi Alonso "one of the best in the world" amid rumours the Spaniard will replace him as Real Madrid manager.
articles.title: Real Madrid: Xabi Alonso 'one of the best in the world' says Carlo Ancelotti

articles.description: Against a backdrop of fan unrest about ticket prices, Fulham are embracing elite hospitality - without being too bothered about the match.
articles.title: Fulham's Riverside Stand with a swimming pool: Club aiming for 'best stand in the world'

articles.description: The Boston Celtics beat the New York Knicks in game three to cut the deficit in their NBA Eastern Conference play-off semi-final series.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Boston Celtics dominate New York Knicks to claim vital win

articles.description: Bournemouth midfielder Alex Scott suffers a fractured jaw from what manager Andoni Iraola describes as a "very violent" elbow from Aston Villa's Tyrone Mings.
articles.title: Alex Scott: Bournemouth midfielder suffers fractured jaw

articles.description: Shane Lowry is in the joint lead of the Truist Championship with Sepp Straka following the third round.
articles.title: Shane Lowry and Sepp Straka in joint lead of Truist Championship
